attributes.action: A local skatepark built in warstones (Penn)
attributes.additional_details: I know a lot of people who like the ride scooter,bikes also skates that wants a nice area to ride without getting shouted at by members off the public. My boyfriend is a bmx’er who is also in on getting a skatepark built witch he would like to contribute getting this done weather that designing it or any little thing he could help witch many of people would enjoy as-well. In warstones there needs to be a place where young people will be able to meet and socialise.
attributes.background: I would like a local skatepark for the younger generation also older in Penn Warstones I feel like this would be good as there a lot off youth crime since a lot of fun things got taken down/destroyed in Penn (warstones) eg-swing on the green, zip lines on Windsor’s park, climbing frame at the rek..

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about local parks are a matter for your local authority, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
